data.lyric:
[ti:Once an Addict (Explicit) (Interlude)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:KOD (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Once an Addict (Interlude) (Interlude|Explicit) - J. Cole
[00:02.58]Right right right right
[00:11.98]Something's got a hold on me right
[00:17.32]
[00:19.45]Right right
[00:20.51]Sometimes I think pain is just a lack of understanding
[00:23.51]
[00:25.17]If we could only understand it all
[00:27.29]
[00:28.12]Would we feel no pain
[00:29.40]Would we feel no pain
[00:30.92]Would we feel no pain
[00:32.20]God must feel no pain
[00:33.52]
[00:34.48]Something's got a hold on me
[00:38.35]
[00:38.92]Only joy
[00:39.88]
[00:41.93]Does this mean even our suffering pleases him
[00:44.94]
[00:45.53]Lost in a cloud of marijuana
[00:47.41]Young Carolina n**ga fish out of water
[00:49.73]Step-daddy just had a daughter with another woman
[00:52.52]Mama ain't recover yet
[00:53.98]Callin' me at 12 at night
[00:55.45]She drunk as f**k and I'm upset
[00:56.86]'Cause why she always using me for crutch
[00:58.61]Growin' up I used to always see her up
[01:00.68]Late as sh*t cigarette smoke
[01:02.18]And greatest hits from Marvin Gaye
[01:03.87]She kill a whole bottle of some cheap chardonnay
[01:06.23]I gotta leave this house
[01:07.40]'Cause part of me dies when I see her like this
[01:09.70]Too young to deal with pain
[01:10.96]I'd rather run the streets than see her kill herself
[01:12.88]So 'Ville became my escape from a feelin' I hate
[01:15.98]Mama cursing me out
[01:17.14]Depression's such a villainous state
[01:19.06]I used to stay out later on purpose
[01:21.21]Subconsciously I was nervous that
[01:22.71]If I came home early
[01:23.91]Then what would surface was her inner demons
[01:26.32]And then I'd have to end up seein' my hero on ground zero
[01:29.46]Tears flow where Al Green blow
[01:31.17]Love and happiness
[01:31.88]I wish that I could say the right words to cheer her up
[01:34.63]I wish her son's love was enough
[01:36.52]I tell her Mama go to sleep
[01:38.11]She tell me
[01:38.63]Boy hush
[01:39.48]You better pray to God
[01:40.50]You never get your heart crushed
[01:42.23]I shake my head in frustration
[01:43.70]Head to my room
[01:44.40]And I can still hear the tunes of my door shut
[01:47.01]F**k it though a couple more months I'll be gone
[01:49.46]Off to college and dorms
[01:50.82]Foolin' myself thinkin' problems are gone
[01:53.19]But now it's 1 AM and my mama diallin' my phone
[01:55.87]I know she intoxicated and soon this high
[01:58.08]That I'm on comes crashin' down
[02:00.18]She lit talkin' drunk sh*t I'm pissed
[02:02.38]But I'm still all ears like Pass the ounce
[02:04.42]Thinkin' to myself
[02:05.25]Maybe my mama need help
[02:06.77]Don't she got work it the morning
[02:08.15]Why she do this to herself
[02:09.58]Hate how she slurrin' her words
[02:11.03]Soundin' so f**kin' absurd
[02:12.33]This ain't the woman I know
[02:13.69]Why I just sit and observe
[02:15.22]Why don't I say how I feel
[02:16.70]When I do she's defensive for real
[02:18.49]Well maybe things get better with time I heard it heals
[02:21.71]Little did I know how deep her sadness would go
[02:24.24]Lookin' back I wish I woulda did more instead of running
[02:26.97]
[02:27.64]Something's got a hold on me
[02:31.99]I can't let it go
[02:34.21]
[02:34.74]Out of fear I won't be free
[02:39.06]Something's got a hold on me
[02:43.30]I can't let it go
[02:46.05]Out of fear I won't be
[02:49.35]No
[02:50.38]Something's got a hold on me
[02:54.73]I can't let it go
[02:57.15]
[02:57.93]Right right
[03:01.36]
[03:02.89]Life can bring much pain right right
[03:07.26]There are many ways to deal with this pain right
[03:09.88]
[03:11.70]Choose wisely
data.trans:
[ti:Once an Addict (Explicit) (Interlude)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:KOD (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.58]是的 没错 是的 没错
[00:11.98]一种莫名的东西把我困住了
[00:17.32]
[00:19.45]是的 没错
[00:20.51]有时候我感到痛苦只是因为缺乏理解
[00:23.51]
[00:25.17]如果我们可以完全理解痛苦
[00:27.29]
[00:28.12]我们还会感到痛苦吗
[00:29.40]我们还会感到痛苦吗
[00:30.92]我们还会感到痛苦吗
[00:32.20]上帝一定不会感到痛苦
[00:33.52]
[00:34.48]一种莫名的东西把我困住了
[00:38.35]
[00:38.92]只有快乐
[00:39.88]
[00:41.93]这是否意味着我们的苦难会取悦上帝
[00:44.94]
[00:45.53]在**中迷失自我
[00:47.41]我像是一条涉世未深的小鱼
[00:49.73]继父和另一个女人生了女儿
[00:52.52]妈妈还没有恢复健康
[00:53.98]午夜十二点她打电话给我
[00:55.45]她喝得烂醉如泥 让我很难过
[00:56.86]为什么她总是把我当成支柱
[00:58.61]我已长大 但我过去时常见到她
[01:00.68]她不停的抽烟
[01:02.18]一边听着马文盖伊的音乐
[01:03.87]一边喝掉整瓶的廉价霞多丽酒
[01:06.23]我要离开这里
[01:07.40]因为她的所作所为已让我死心
[01:09.70]我还年幼 为何要承受这些痛苦
[01:10.96]我宁愿流浪街头也不愿看到她自杀
[01:12.88]所以维尔成了我逃避恨的地方
[01:15.98]妈妈一直在骂我
[01:17.14]抑郁就是这样邪恶的状态
[01:19.06]我过去常常故意呆在外面
[01:21.21]我下意识地感到紧张
[01:22.71]如果我提前回家
[01:23.91]那么她内心的恶魔会是什么样子呢
[01:26.32]然后我只能去看我的英雄
[01:29.46]艾尔格林擦去了我的眼泪
[01:31.17]让我相信爱与幸福
[01:31.88]我希望我能说出优美的话使她高兴
[01:34.63]我希望她的儿子得到充足的爱
[01:36.52]我告诉她妈妈去睡觉
[01:38.11]她对我说
[01:38.63]嘘 宝贝
[01:39.48]你最好向上帝祈祷
[01:40.50]让你的心永远不会碎
[01:42.23]我沮丧地摇摇头
[01:43.70]回到我的房间
[01:44.40]我依然能听到关门的声音
[01:47.01]虽然再过几个月我就要离开
[01:49.46]到大学的宿舍里居住
[01:50.82]我愚蠢地认为一切的问题都会随之消失
[01:53.19]但是现在是午夜一点 妈妈再一次打电话过来
[01:55.87]我知道她醉了 这么快就醉了
[01:58.08]让我心里忐忑不安
[02:00.18]她喝得大醉 烂醉如泥
[02:02.38]但我依然认真地听她说话
[02:04.42]我在想
[02:05.25]或许妈妈需要我的帮助
[02:06.77]她早上没有去工作吗
[02:08.15]她为何这样惩罚自己
[02:09.58]我讨厌她总是口齿不清
[02:11.03]让人听起来模棱两可
[02:12.33]这还是我认识的那个女人吗
[02:13.69]为什么我只是坐着观察
[02:15.22]为什么不说出自己的感受
[02:16.70]她真的抗拒我所做的一切吗
[02:18.49]但我想也许随着时间的推移 情况会好转
[02:21.71]我不知道她的悲伤会有多深
[02:24.24]回顾过去 我多么希望我能为她做更多 而不是逃离
[02:26.97]
[02:27.64]一种莫名的东西把我困住了
[02:31.99]我不能放弃
[02:34.21]
[02:34.74]由于恐惧 我失去了自由
[02:39.06]一种莫名的东西把我困住了
[02:43.30]我不能放弃
[02:46.05]由于恐惧 我失去了自由
[02:49.35]不
[02:50.38]一种莫名的东西把我困住了
[02:54.73]我不能放弃
[02:57.15]
[02:57.93]是的 没错
[03:01.36]
[03:02.89]生活会带来无尽的痛苦 是的 没错
[03:07.26]但是有很多方法可以解决这种痛苦
[03:09.88]
[03:11.70]我们要明智的选择
